00044 using namespace Hypertable;
00045 using namespace std;
00046 
00047 namespace {
00048   const char *usage[] = {
00049     "usage: generateTestData [OPTIONS] <tablename>",
00050     "",
00051     "OPTINS:",
00052     "  --config=<fname>  Read configuration properties from <fname>",
00053     "  --limit=<n>       Only output <n> lines of testdata",
00054     "  --no-deletes      Don't generate delete records so output can",
00055     "                    be used with the LOAD DATA FILE HQL command",
00056     "  --seed=<n>        Seed the randon number generator with <n>",
00057     "  --timestamps      Generate timestamps",
00058     "  --qualifier-limit=<n>  Limit the pool of qualifiers to <n>",
00059     "  --row-limit=<n>   Limit the pool of row keys to <n>",
00060     "",
00061     "This program generates random test data to stdout.  It",
00062     "contacts the master server and fetches the schema for",
00063     "the given table <tablename> and creates random test",
00064     "data for the table.  It requires the following input",
00065     "files to be located under ../demo relative to the",
00066     "location of the generateTestData binary:",
00067     "",
00068     "shakespeare.txt.gz",
00069     "urls.txt.gz",
00070     "words.gz",
00071     "",
00072     "Approximately 1 out of 50 lines will be row deletes and",
00073     "1 out of 30 lines will be cell deletes.  The rest are normal",
00074     "inserts.  Each emitted line has one of the following",
00075     "formats:",
00076     "",
00077     "<timestamp> '\\t' <rowkey> '\\t' <qualifiedcolumn> '\\t' <value>",
00078     "<timestamp> '\\t' <rowkey> '\\t' <qualifiedcolumn> '\\t' DELETE",
00079     "<timestamp> '\\t' DELETE",
00080     "",
00081     "The <timestamp> field will contain the word AUTO unless the",
00082     "--timestamp argument was supplied, in which case it will contain",
00083     "the number of microseconds since the epoch that have elapsed at",
00084     "the time the line was emitted.",
00085     0
00086   };
00087 }

00089 
00090 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00091   TestData tdata;
00092   Schema *schema;
00093   std::string schemaspec;
00094   struct timeval tval;
00095   uint64_t timestamp = 0;
00096   uint32_t index;
00097   const char *rowkey;
00098   const char *qualifier;
00099   uint8_t family;
00100   const char *content, *ptr;
00101   std::string value;
00102   size_t cfmax;
00103   vector<std::string> cfnames;
00104   int modval;
00105   std::string cfgfile = "";
00106   Client *client;
00107   std::string tablename = "";
00108   unsigned int seed = 1234;
00109   bool gen_timestamps = false;
00110   uint32_t cqlimit = 0;
00111   uint32_t row_limit = 0;
00112   uint32_t limit = 0;
00113   uint32_t emitted = 0;
00114   bool no_deletes = false;
00115 
00116   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00117     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00118       cfgfile = &argv[i][9];
00119     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--seed=", 7)) {
00120       seed = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00121     }
00122     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--qualifier-limit=", 18)) {
00123       cqlimit = atoi(&argv[i][18]);
00124     }
00125     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--row-limit=", 12)) {
00126       row_limit = atoi(&argv[i][12]);
00127     }
00128     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--limit=", 8)) {
00129       limit = atoi(&argv[i][8]);
00130     }
00131     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--timestamps")) {
00132       gen_timestamps = true;
00133     }
00134     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--no-deletes")) {
00135       no_deletes = true;
00136     }
00137     else if (tablename == "")
00138       tablename = argv[i];
00139     else
00140       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (tablename == "")
00144     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00145 
00146   if (cfgfile == "")
00147     cfgfile = System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00148 
00149   if (!tdata.load(System::install_dir + "/demo"))
00150     exit(1);
00151 
00152   client = new Client(argv[0], cfgfile);
00153 
00154   try {
00155     schemaspec = client->get_schema(tablename);
00156   }
00157   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00158     HT_ERRORF("Problem getting schema for table '%s' - %s", argv[1], e.what());
00159     return e.code();
00160   }
00161 
00162   schema = Schema::new_instance(schemaspec.c_str(), strlen(schemaspec.c_str()), true);
00163   if (!schema->is_valid()) {
00164     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error: %s", schema->get_error_string());
00165     exit(1);
00166   }
00167 
00168   cfmax = schema->get_max_column_family_id();
00169   cfnames.resize(cfmax+1);
00170 
00171   list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *aglist = schema->get_access_group_list();
00172   for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator iter = aglist->begin(); iter != aglist->end(); iter++) {
00173     for (list<Schema::ColumnFamily *>::iterator cf_it = (*iter)->columns.begin(); cf_it != (*iter)->columns.end(); cf_it++)
00174       cfnames[(*cf_it)->id] = (*cf_it)->name;
00175   }
00176 
00177   if (cqlimit == 0)
00178     cqlimit = tdata.urls.size();
00179   else if (tdata.urls.size() < cqlimit)
00180     cqlimit = tdata.urls.size();
00181 
00182   if (row_limit == 0)
00183     row_limit = tdata.words.size();
00184   else if (tdata.words.size() < row_limit)
00185     row_limit = tdata.words.size();
00186 
00187   srand(seed);
00188 
00192   if (gen_timestamps)
00193     cout << "timestamp\trowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue" << endl;
00194   else
00195     cout << "rowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue" << endl;
00196 
00197   while (true) {
00198 
00199     if (limit && emitted >= limit)
00200       break;
00201     emitted++;
00202 
00203     if (gen_timestamps) {
00204       // timestamp
00205       gettimeofday(&tval, 0);
00206       timestamp = ((uint64_t)tval.tv_sec * 1000000LL) + tval.tv_usec;
00207     }
00208 
00209     // row key
00210     index = rand() % row_limit;
00211     rowkey = tdata.words[index].get();
00212 
00213     index = rand();
00214     modval = rand() % 49;
00215     if (!no_deletes && (index % 49) == (size_t)modval) {
00216       if (gen_timestamps)
00217         cout << timestamp << "\t" << rowkey << "\tDELETE" << endl;
00218       else
00219         cout << rowkey << "\tDELETE" << endl;
00220       continue;
00221     }
00222 
00223     index = rand();
00224     family = (index % cfmax) + 1;
00225 
00226     index = rand() % cqlimit;
00227     qualifier = tdata.urls[index].get();
00228 
00229     index = rand();
00230     modval = rand() % 29;
00231     if (!no_deletes && (index % 29) == 0) {
00232       if (gen_timestamps)
00233         cout << timestamp << "\t" << rowkey << "\t" << cfnames[family] << ":" << qualifier << "\tDELETE" << endl;
00234       else
00235         cout << rowkey << "\t" << cfnames[family] << ":" << qualifier << "\tDELETE" << endl;
00236       continue;
00237     }
00238 
00239     index = rand() % tdata.content.size();
00240     content = tdata.content[index].get();
00241 
00242     if ((ptr = strchr(content, '\n')) != 0)
00243       value = std::string(content, ptr-content);
00244     else
00245       value = content;
00246 
00247     if (gen_timestamps)
00248       cout << timestamp << "\t" << rowkey << "\t" << cfnames[family] << ":" << qualifier << "\t" << value << endl;
00249     else
00250       cout << rowkey << "\t" << cfnames[family] << ":" << qualifier << "\t" << value << endl;
00251   }
00252 
00253   return 0;
00254 }
